column8:
Quite a few changes here relative to the last RC but everything is related to
refactorings and such. No new fundamental addition of functionality or
substantially new unsafe code.

Reviewed in CL 588384310
Issues found:
 - https://github.com/hyperium/hyper/pull/3498
 - https://github.com/hyperium/hyper/issues/3556
 - https://github.com/hyperium/hyper/issues/3500 
(probably not a real issue)
 - https://github.com/hyperium/hyper/issues/3554 (documentation)
Fixes a bug where memory was reserved based on an adversary-controllable size, before the\ncorresponding data was received.\n
